comments.raw_text:
(originally filed as https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=707679)

Description of problem:
I have changed the default Fedora home page by replacing fedora URL in the
/usr/lib/firefox-3.6/browserconfig.properties of fedora 14
but i could not find a away to do same for Firefox4 in Fedora 15
is there any other file handles the home page?

I just want to replace the http://start.fedoraproject.org/ as the Home Page
using my kickstart file for re-branding of my remix. (I do not use Fedora logo
and release notes as I am working on a remix instead of SPIN)

Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
Firefox 4+
comments.creator: mcepl@cepl.eu
